service_pages.lcp_candidate: TrustProof component was importing entire stories database client-side.
service_pages.optimization: Refactored TrustProof to accept stories as server-side props.

changes.change: Refactored to accept `stories` prop instead of importing `patientStories` directly. Updated `brain-tumor-surgery-hyderabad` and `endoscopic-spine-surgery-hyderabad` to pass filtered stories from server.
changes.impact: Reduced client bundle size for pages using TrustProof by decoupling the stories database from the client component. Improved hydration performance.
